name: my-app

scripts.start: concurrently "react-scripts start" "cd.. && cd backend && nodemon index" "cd.. && cd backend2 && nodemon index"

description: 1. It allows students to book PG and Hostel rooms online . 2. Every Hostel and PG in a city can be brought to a single platform making it easy for students to book a room . 3. Hostel Search by City and Neighborhood . 4. Hostel Sorting by Cost , Gender , Mess and Room Availability . 5. User booking through online payment .
